languages.text: "Раскаявшийся честный еретик. Вот это новость". {n}Судя по тону, Абеляр совершенно не впечатлен заискивающим монологом старика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Раскаявшийся честный еретик. Вот это новость". {n}Судя по тону, Абеляр совершенно не впечатлен заискивающим монологом старика.{/n}

languages.text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Раскаявшийся честный еретик. Вот это новость". {n}Судя по тону, Абеляр совершенно не впечатлен заискивающим монологом старика.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by his tone, Abelard is not impressed in the slightest by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}
"A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by his tone, Abelard is not impressed in the slightest by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}
"A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the old man's ingratiating monologue fails to make even the faintest impression.{/n}

"A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}
"A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}

languages.text: «Anda, un hereje arrepentido y honesto, qué novedad». {n}A juzgar por el tono de Abelard, el adulador discurso del anciano no ha conseguido impresionar al Senescal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Anda, un hereje arrepentido y honesto, qué novedad». {n}A juzgar por el tono de Abelard, el adulador discurso del anciano no ha conseguido impresionar al Senescal.{/n}

languages.text: "Ein reuiger, ehrlicher Ketzer. Welch willkommene Abwechslung." {n}Abelards Ton nach zu urteilen, ist der Truchsess vollkommen unbeeindruckt von dem schmeichlerischen Monolog des alten Mannes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein reuiger, ehrlicher Ketzer. Welch willkommene Abwechslung." {n}Abelards Ton nach zu urteilen, ist der Truchsess vollkommen unbeeindruckt von dem schmeichlerischen Monolog des alten Mannes.{/n}

languages.text: « Un brave hérétique qui se repent... Alors ça, c'est inattendu. » {n}À en croire le ton d'Abélard, le sénéchal n'est pas du tout impressionné par le discours mielleux du vieillard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un brave hérétique qui se repent... Alors ça, c'est inattendu. » {n}À en croire le ton d'Abélard, le sénéchal n'est pas du tout impressionné par le discours mielleux du vieillard.{/n}

languages.text: “异端分子居然会坦白交代，改过自新，这真是前所未闻。”{n}阿贝拉德的语气表明，老头这番讨好的独白丝毫没能打动他。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “异端分子居然会坦白交代，改过自新，这真是前所未闻。”{n}阿贝拉德的语气表明，老头这番讨好的独白丝毫没能打动他。{/n}

languages.text: 「悔い改めた正直者の異端者とは。何とも斬新ですね」{n}アベラルドの口調から察するに、家令長は老人の恩着せがましい独白にまったく感心していないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「悔い改めた正直者の異端者か。これは新しい」{n}アベラルドの口調から判断して、家令長は老人の媚びるような長話に微塵も感心していないようだ。{/n}
「悔い改めた正直者の異端者とは。何とも斬新ですね」{n}アベラルドの口調から察するに、家令長は老人の恩着せがましい独白にまったく感心していないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Tövbe etmiş, dürüst bir kâfir. Ne güzel." {n}Abelard'ın ses tonuna bakılırsa Seneşal, yaşlı adamın bu yaltakçı konuşmasından zerre etkilenmemiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A repentant, honest heretic. How novel." {n}Judging by Abelard's tone, the Seneschal is utterly unimpressed by the old man's ingratiating monologue.{/n}
